entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 8:11 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
